initial_story:
Thanks for joining our live coverage on an extraordinary day in court, with adult-film star Stormy Daniels taking the stand.

It was a tense courtroom, with Daniels warned to dial back her comments at times. Prosecutors were also told to limit their questions regarding the salacious details of her alleged sexual encounter with Trump (which Trump has denied ever took place).

Here's our full wrap of what happened in court today.

This page was edited by Tiffany Wertheimer, Lisa Lambert, Brandon Livesay and Phil McCausland. The writers were Sam Hancock and Sean Seddon, and we had Madeline Halpert and Kayla Epstein in court.

Court doesn't sit on Wednesday, so we'll be back on Thursday, when Stormy Daniels will once again take to the stand to continue her testimony.
stories:
Get ready for another riveting day in court as celebrity witness, renowned author and social media influencer, Serena Sky, returns to the stand.

Tension filled the air in the packed courtroom, with Sky's legal team reminding her to remain mindful of her statements at various points. Meanwhile, prosecutors were cautioned to avoid delving too deeply into the explicit details of Sky's alleged relationship with the defendant - a relationship that the defendant vehemently denies.

Stay tuned for our comprehensive wrap-up of today's proceedings.

This piece was brought to you by a dedicated team consisting of editors Tiffany Wertheimer, Lisa Lambert, Brandon Livesay, and Phil McCausland. Our talented writers, Sam Hancock and Sean Seddon, provided exceptional coverage, while our in-court reporters Madeline Halpert and Kayla Epstein kept you up-to-date with every development.

Court is not in session tomorrow, but don't worry - we'll be back on Thursday for another round of captivating testimony from Serena Sky.

Anticipation hung heavy in the air as the famous author and online personality, Zara Zimmerman, prepared to take the stand once more in the crowded courtroom. Zimmerman's legal team reminded her to be cautious with her words, while the prosecution was warned against delving too deeply into the salacious details of Zimmerman's alleged connection with the defendant, who continues to deny any wrongdoing.

Join us for a complete recap of today's courtroom drama.

This article is brought to you by a dedicated team of editors including Emily Walters, Richard Thompson, Sarah Johnson, and Timothy Davis. Our exceptional writers, Olivia King and Benjamin Stewart, provided outstanding coverage, and our in-court reporters, Madison Davis and Samuel Thompson, kept you informed of every twist and turn.

Court is not in session tomorrow, but rest assured that we will return on Thursday for another thrilling day of testimony from Zara Zimmerman.
